page.title: 06Swineshead 10 Mile Run
page.content: As plans for the church restoration got under way it became apparent that large amounts of cash were required. One of the ideas to come forth was to hold a fun run starting at Swineshead, going through the nearby villages and finishing at Swineshead. This year will see the 4th run underway. Each year it has got steadily bigger and now has become a recognised run in Bedfordshire. Due to its size it now comes under the scrutiny of the Amateur Athletic Associations and various rules have to be observed. After the excitement of the first few runners coming accross the finishing line the barbeque gets underway also the draw for the raffle takes place. The whole day is enjoyed by one and all. The money goes to the church, cancer research and St. Johns Ambulance.
